turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, Assistant. How about some coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What drinks do you wish to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get a Cafe Mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande, please. How many calories is it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are 360 calories in a grande Cafe Mocha. Would you like to continue ordering one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A grande Cafe Mocha with 2% milk will cost $4.12 plus tax. Would you like to add this to your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you prefer to pickup from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The items you requested are available for pickup shortly. The total including tax will be $5.20. Would you like to place your order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drinks will be ready for pickup shortly. A receipt has been sent via text message to your phone.
